title: What is the role of a student counselor? - Quora

response.answer_text: Each country has different standard operating procedures laid out for counsellors in the school and universities. In India, CBSE has mandated an appointment of counsellor in the CBSE school. Various prominent institutions of higher education also appoints counsellor. Counsellors in education set up have major role in supporting students to set their academic / career goals, effectively help manage emotional and behavioural problems, and generate awareness on mental health among students, teachers and management. https://www.google.co.in/url?sa=t&source=web&rct=j&url=http://cbse.nic.in/circulars/cir08-2008.doc&ved=2ahUKEwjQlOSqgtzeAhWJto8KHQjoDJcQFjANegQICRAB&usg=AOvVaw2vtp0ChY0Th9c-WOiQCG_I Hope this helps
